item.title: Wild! The Musical
item.description: Was in charge of the videotaping of the Wild! the musical, with a multicam version of different takes of the show.

item.title: Dissapearing Dai Pai Dong
item.description: Dissapearing Dai Pai Dong A piece following the evolution of street food regulations in Hong Kong, and the impact that has had on the slowly dissapearing tradition of “Dai Pai Dong” street food.

item.title: Retro Game Changer
item.description: Video games are 60 years old. As they become more and more complex, connected, and “true to life”, there are many that prefer to go back to the past. “Retro” games, which may have been disregarded as obsolete and old-looking by some, have become the centerpoint of large communities. These are in large part people who were not even born when the game was released.
